net.mdwright.var

Class VarMath

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.mdwright.var.VarMath

  • public class VarMath
extends java.lang.Object
    Class for supporting calculations used in value at risk models.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      VarMath()

    • Method Detail

      • calculateMean

        public static java.math.BigDecimal calculateMean(Position position)
        Method for calculating the mean close price across a historical data set.
        Parameters:
        position - Position object of the position to calculate the mean across
        Returns:
        BigDecimal value representing the mean across the entire data set

      • calculateCoefficient

        public static double calculateCoefficient(Position positionOne,
                                          Position positionTwo)
        Method for calculating the coefficient of correlation between two positions.
        Parameters:
        positionOne - Position object of the first position to calculate with
        positionTwo - Position object of the second position to calculate with
        Returns:
        A double value representing the coefficient in range -1 to 1 Influence for calculation method taken from https://budgeting.thenest.com/correlation-two-stocks-32359.html

      • getPercentageChanges

        public static double[] getPercentageChanges(Portfolio portfolio,
                                            int positionIndex)
        Method to create an array of percentage changes between each days prices.
        Parameters:
        portfolio - Portfolio object containing the position object and historical data
        positionIndex - int value representing the index pointer for the target asset in the portfolio array
        Returns:
        An array of doubles representing the percentage changes between each day's closing price

      • getSmallestDatasetSize

        public static int getSmallestDatasetSize(Portfolio portfolio)
        Method to retrieve the size of the smallest historical dataset in a portfolio.
        Parameters:
        portfolio - Portfolio object containing position objects with historical data
        Returns:
        int value representing the size of the smallest dataset in the portfolio

      • getHashMaps

        public static java.util.List<java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.math.BigDecimal>> getHashMaps(Portfolio portfolio)
        Method to retrieve a list of hashmaps relating dates to prices for charting the portfolio value.
        Parameters:
        portfolio - Portfolio object containing position objects with historical data
        Returns:
        List of Maps mapping a date in string format to the days adj. closing price
